line_1: Then comes the Spirit to our hut,
line_2: When fast the senses' doors are shut;

line_1: And haply, eye the barren hut,
line_2: Some, lucky, find a flow'ry spot,

line_1: And haply, eye the barren hut,
line_2: For which they never toil'd nor swat;

line_1: And haply, eye the barren hut,
line_2: They drink the sweet and eat the fat,
